name: DailyWords
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Words”
”Alexa, ask Daily Words for the Word of the Day”
”Alexa, start Daily Words”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily words
des:
Whether you want to improve vocabulary or even your SAT Score, Words will allow you to learn a new word everyday!

Simply ask Words for the "word of the day".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
